Chopped is an extremely powerful drug that is

Users of American grass will suffer from mental disorders, emotional disorders, and

issued warnings to people to
Be careful with a type of American grass laced with drugs
because of the unimaginable dangers.
These are young people under 18 years old who gathered to
use narcotic substances at a coffee shop in
ward 12, Binh Thanh district, and were fined by the
ward police.  Quickly
discovered that among 13 young people who tested
positive for the drug THC and marijuana, the
authorities confiscated a number of cans containing
dried herbs, also known as American grass. This is the
image that the police urgently searched.
Defendant Nguyen Minh The's residence, Binh
Tri Dong ward, Binh Tan district, confiscated many
yellow cans containing
drug-laced American percussion, in addition to arresting
drug trafficking and transportation networks, the police
advised the entire  Social organizations join hands in
propagating for young people, especially
students, to stay away from drugs
hiding in the shadow of America because of unpredictable dangers.
Ho Chi Minh City Technology Park
has begun to enter the development stage.
The new thing is to focus on attracting
projects that help improve technological capacity and
endogenous capacity to develop
domestic enterprises with the capacity to absorb and apply
science and technology, thereby serving the
socio-economic development of the country.
This strategic goal has been set by the city's high-tech park
and efforts have been made to
implement it. Ho Chi Minh City's high-tech park
currently has 160 investment projects with a
total capital of 12 billion VND.  The annual
production value in this technology park is about
20 billion USD, of which spending on
research and development accounts for about 200 million
USD. The strategy is to invest
in smart people.
High-tech products include, for example,
semiconductors and electronic circuits, investment companies
serving according to those strategies,
each development business unit will
contribute to the overall development of the
high-tech park.  This city is also an
important basis to move towards the
larger development goal of becoming a
national high-tech center. In terms of investment scale,
investment in An must increase 10 times compared
to the present.
This essence is also a measure of the
development of the city's high-tech park
in the new period, in which the core is to
upgrade technology development to increase
production value as well as create a
foundation for industrial development.  of

40 MV machines.  a total of 80 MV

This situation has damaged more than 6,500 m of

Many other routes in Tran

billions of branches cut and even cut

Tran Van Thoi district's Agriculture and Rural Development
said that this is a direction from above to limit
the situation of accidentally digging into the ground because
trees with large branches will be blown by the wind and
shake, easily causing accidental charging. Ca Mau is a province  The

Today's tradition of playing sports
not only brings health but also
brings great spiritual values. In
Western Australia, swimming experts
have supported many people to participate in
freestyle swimming, thereby overcoming  and overcoming
many psychological syndromes
is a marine scientist and also
an experienced marine calming expert.
13 years ago, she was shocked by the
death of her companion while
sailing freely, and since then she has been free.  began my
journey of training people how to learn
free silence and overcome psychological trauma. I
began to develop this idea of ​​free
silence therapy. I myself
experienced post-traumatic stress disorder.
about psychology and found
that free silence actually has a
very good healing effect for myself. I have
tried many methods of mindfulness,
meditation and everything but they don't
work. But when in water, as soon as the water
Touching my face makes me feel
relaxed, and for psychologists,
practicing free silence will help people
learn how to hold their breath as long as
possible but still feel comfortable and confident
when moving and maintaining balance.  in
free calm water helps them make their
own discoveries both externally and internally.

arrest more than 200 people who escaped from the drug rehabilitation camp
in Soc
Trang and in time.  While extinguishing a fire in a
car dealership in Binh
Thuan, taking advantage of a conflict between
some students in the camp, nearly 200 students
of the drug rehabilitation facility in Soc Trang
controlled the guards and escaped from the
detention camp.  drug addiction last night, February 24. Up
to now, the search for those who
escaped from the camp is still being conducted
urgently after the conflict between the
students in the camp was resolved
on the afternoon of February 24.  At 17:00 on the same
day, dozens of people showing unusual signs
poured out of the gate of the detoxification facility. The
security force was controlled by this group of people
to rush out. Immediately after that, the
police force came to restore order, but the group of
drug addicts  resisted and
fled with a total of 191 people until about
2:30 p.m. This afternoon, the forces
coordinated to bring more than 100 people back to the camp. Currently, the
provincial authorities are continuing to
search for those who escaped from the
camp.  Soc Trang currently has more than
460 people in compulsory drug addiction treatment,
but when the incident occurred, there were 417
people present and most of them were men.
Fire prevention and
rescue police of Binh Thuan province along with
People just promptly controlled a
fire at a car dealership in Phan
Thiet industrial park. The incident happened
at about 10:25 on February 25,
Fire and Rescue Police Department of the

at Lot 4/3, Street 4,

Thu Duc City, Ho Chi Minh City,
completed the reconstruction of the scene of a traffic accident
in the early morning that left a
woman dead on the spot of her motorbike.  The person
involved left the scene and
then at nearly 4:00 a.m., a woman in her
50s was riding a motorbike on Highway 1 from the
Tsunami Bridge to An Suong when she arrived
in front of the waiting area for agricultural products in Thu
Duc Ward, Thu Duc Ward.  Tam Binh, this vehicle collided
with another motorbike traveling in the same direction. The
accident caused the woman to fall into the
traffic barrier at the spot where the motorbike
involved left the scene. The
authorities were present to regulate traffic.  After
examining the scene until 7:30 a.m., the
victim was transferred to the morgue. The
case is currently being investigated by the Thu Duc City Criminal Police Team and
also at this time by Thuan An City police
and the Department of Investigation.  Traffic police of
Binh Duong province have returned the
scene records of the case of a motorbike crashing into the back of a
container truck at a red light, causing one person to
die. The incident occurred early the same
day around 5:00 a.m. a man was
driving.  The machine was running on My complex Tan
Van road, heading from Thu Dau 1 city to
Di An city. When it reached the traffic intersection of
An Phu Phuong, An Phu, Thuan An city,
this vehicle's chassis and chassis were
stopped waiting for the red light.  The
collision caused the man's head to hit the
container and fall to the street, motionless. Although he was
quickly taken to the hospital for emergency treatment, the
victim died. The victim was
identified as Mr. Bui Chi Cong, born in
1979, from Ca Mau province.  He worked for a
company and had just gotten off work and was on his way back to his
room in Di An city when he encountered an
accident. The authorities were present to
regulate traffic to examine the scene and
investigate the cause of the
accident.  The investigation police of
An Giang province have just decided to prosecute
the case and temporarily detain Ngo Van Tinh, born in
1973, residing in Tan Lap ward, Bo
Ma city, Dak Lak province, for fraudulent
appropriation of
property after a period of time.  Receiving the news and
conducting an investigation, the authorities determined that
Ngo Van of the province was a regular customer who frequently
rented a car from Mr. Dinh Thanh Tung in
Chau Phu B ward, Chau Doc city, An
Giang in September 2022.
Tung rented a car for 700,000 VND
a day and a month, then due to debt and
was unable to pay, he brought
Tung's rental car to Lam Dong to sell
for 520 million VND, also during
this time the province continued to pay.  The prison rented
another car for 900,000 VND a day
from September 18 to December 30,
2022. The province paid over 100
million VND for the car rental, then the province did not pay and
contacted until October 26,
2024.  The province was arrested while hiding in
Trung Chanh commune, Khue Mon district,
Ho Chi Minh City. Currently, police investigation of
An Giang province has recovered the above two vehicles
and continues to investigate and handle the incident according to
